Vidip Ghosh

Summary
Full Stack Software Engineer skilled in building production-style web applications and AI-powered workflows
using Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB — with hands-on experience in LLM-driven
RAG systems and vector search.

Resume Screening App| Node.js, React, Gemini, LangChain, VectorDBNov 2025 – Present
•
Developed a RAG-based resume screening platform that embeds resumes into Pinecone using Gemini embeddings
and compares them to job descriptions via LangChain agents.
•

match scores and conversational insights through an AI assistant.
VoiceVault| Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, Aptos Blockchain, Generative AINov 2025 – Present
•
Developed a decentralized voice-identity proof-of-ownership system using Aptos Move smart contracts, enabling
verifiable creator ownership and on-chain licensing.
•
Designed end-to-end workflows for creator registration, AI-assisted identity verification, and tokenized licensing,
supporting secure minting and management of voice-rights NFTs.

estimated 40% improvement in attribution transparency.
LocalPay| Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, TON BlockchainNov 2025 – Present

Engineered a TON-powered mini commerce dApp with full commerce lifecycle support, tested across multiple
checkout and pricing scenarios to ensure stable dashboard updates.
•
Implemented AI-driven merchant insights and LLM-powered invoicing workflows, automating pricing analysis and
invoice generation for simulated merchant operations.
•
Executed 20+ transaction simulations to validate pricing logic, checkout behavior, and analytics accuracy, ensuring
stable performance across core merchant actions.
